title: XCOM: Enemy Within MULT i9 Steam-Rip by RG GameWorks
description:
XCOM: Enemy Within MULT i9 Steam-Rip by RG GameWorks



Info:
Release Date : November 15, 2013
Genre: Add-on (Standalone) / Strategy (Turn-based / Tactical) / 3D
Developer: Firaxis Games
Published by: 2K Games
Platform: PC


Publication Type: License [Steam-Rip]



Language: Russian / English / French / German / Italian / Spanish / Korean / Polish / Japanese


Sound language: Russian / English


Tablet: Is present [RELOADED (fixed)]




Release Information

Uploaded on:November 14, 2013
Version:1.0.0.922
Compression:zip




Installation:

Set # 1 (Normal) :

1.Install by running setup.exe
2.Copy the contents of the folder NoDVD in the game folder
3.Play



Set # 2 (For holders of licenses) :


Caution: Before installing a client Steam, the game should already be registered on the account, and the client Steam - closed!
1.]Install by running setup.exe
2.Copy the contents of the Steam folder to your client
3.Play
